channel.title: What's your biggest RSPS pet peeve?
channel.description:
What annoys you the most when you are going through a released source?
I personally hate it when people write "atleast" instead of "at least"

item.title: What's your biggest RSPS pet peeve?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“lare69, post:60, topic:544111”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=662990.msg4436738#msg4436738 date=1405312935]
When people unnecessarily end strings with + “”);
[/quote]
this and when people don’t document their code[/quote]Guilty as charged. However, with all my time on Moparscape, I’ve released an extremely small fraction of my sources, my code, etc. I’m not much for sharing.

Read full topic
item.source: What's your biggest RSPS pet peeve?

item.title: What's your biggest RSPS pet peeve?
item.dc:creator: @Michael_P1 Michael P
item.description:
@Michael_P1 wrote:

[quote=“lare69, post:60, topic:544111”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=662990.msg4436738#msg4436738 date=1405312935]
When people unnecessarily end strings with + “”);
[/quote]
this and when people don’t document their code[/quote]

I only document if it’s needed or if I’m going to be releasing something. No need to document the code if only yourself are going to view it.

Read full topic

item.title: What's your biggest RSPS pet peeve?
item.dc:creator: @Death_Style Death Style
item.description:
@Death_Style wrote:

All these custom clients are kind of annoying too. I remember when just about every server worked with the Mopar client. I wish someone would make an all purpose client that could import things as needed by a server command instead of having to redownload 99% of the same cache on every server I play.

Read full topic
item.source: What's your biggest RSPS pet peeve?

item.title: What's your biggest RSPS pet peeve?
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

[quote=“I Pk 22, post:49, topic:544111”]Most annoying would be when people say it’s a 503+ and nek minnit just PI with all these custom items and crap.

Also when a good source gets released all people do is rearrange home, change NPC locations, item stats and dialogues and they call that “new unique content” LOL.[/quote]
What you’re implying is people change NPC locations.

Read full topic

item.title: What's your biggest RSPS pet peeve?
item.dc:creator: @Death_Style Death Style
item.description:
@Death_Style wrote:

I think PK points is a cool idea but would be better if the gear you buy with it degraded.

Altho there’s not much defense against someone multilogging and killing themselves for points.

Read full topic
item.source: What's your biggest RSPS pet peeve?

item.title: What's your biggest RSPS pet peeve?
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Laziness. That includes, but is not limited to, Choosing a home location, placing shops all around said home location, creating teleports to training locations that are horrendously easy and OP with no sense of working towards levels or achieving anything, high XP rates for the sake of having a player base versus creating a well rounded server that people want to be on, oh and using F*cking PK points as a reward system to obtain high level gear.

I also forgot to mention those Fcking idiots who use the word “economy” as if it were a dualism of Spawn PK. Just because your server is not Spawn PK does not mean it is automatically an economy server, especially if the server has mother Fcking shops with 9999 of each item in it.

Read full topic
item.source: What's your biggest RSPS pet peeve?

item.title: What's your biggest RSPS pet peeve?
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

People who say that they have tried 20 different sources and they always get the error: javac is not recognized as in internal or external command, and then they post about it in server help.

Overall: People who don’t know what the hell they’re doing.

++ People who post in the development section with just ideas for their server, but don’t post snippets, code, images, progress, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: What's your biggest RSPS pet peeve?
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

sinisoul:

Bitches gonna bitch. And it’s pronounced sigh-nigh, like the sound in night without the ‘t’. Not cinnamon minus the ‘amon’ plus a hard ‘I’. Pleebs.

I thought your name stood for sinister soul.
